attributes.action: send the Elgin Marbles back to Athens to be housed in  the new museum .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The argument that Greece had nowhere suitable to house the Elgin Marbles is no longer valid now that the new Acropolis Museum is open.  Other European Countries [Austria for eg] have returned marbles to Greece.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
